name: Villain Type Generator
explanation: This generator produces a quick personality for a new villain based on villain achetype.
source: Villain archetypes and descriptions from 'The Villain: Archetypes', by Word Hunter (WordPress) 8/8/2016.

tables.name: authorityChar
entries:
Other names: Career Bitch, The Abusive Autocrat, Dictator 
1) Corporate Climber with no morals or loyalty 
2) Holds on to power at any cost 
2) Collects sycophants who protect them 
Goal: climb to the top and stay there

tables.name: beastChar
entries:
Other names: the Monster 
1) Literally a monster with a limited mind of its own 
2) Can be heroic but misunderstood like Godzila 
Goal: feed or protect territory

tables.name: bigbadChar
entries:
Other names: power behind the throne, hidden darkness 
1) Superior to other villains 
2) Shrouds themselves in secrecy 
3) Sub-Commanders are Dragons 
Goals: maintain secrecy, oppose heroes once aware of them

tables.name: bullyChar
entries:
1) Opposes heroes directly, tormenting them intentionally 
2) Probably suffered abuse as a child 
3) May be a psychopath or sociopath 
Goal: tormant and obstruct heroes

tables.name: corruptedChar
entries:
Other names: once were good/bad politicians 
1) Started out good or not so bad and were corrupted by criminals, wealth or power 
2) Follows tropes of bad cops, bad politicians 
3) End up serving a mastermaind or big bad 
Goals: protect their secrets and live confortably
